title: Madeira (The arts in)
body: For this subject, some elements can be found in the articles Monuments, Museums, Music, Theaters, Artistic Heritage, and especially in the valuable works of Dr. Manuel de Almeida Cayola Zagalo entitled 'Museu de Arte no Funchal' and 'A Pintura dos SÃ©culos XV e XVI da Ilha da Madeira', 'As Ilhas de Zargo' and the 'Arquivo Historico da Madeira'.
